article.title: SAIC Awarded $17 Million Task Order By Space And Naval Warfare System Center - Atlantic
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a task order by the Space and Naval Warfare (SPAWAR) System Center - Atlantic, Command, Control, Communications, Computers and Intelligence Division to provide improvised explosive device-defeat (IED-D) training services. The task order is for one year with a total value of more than $17 million.
